Glenn picked 2/27 in her four overs. © Getty
England Women won the T20I leg of the multi-format series with a comfortable six-wicket win over South Africa in Worcester in Game 2. Having won the toss… [+1823 chars]

articles.title: Oman's Pankaj Khimji springs a surprise in Associates election | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The Oman Cricket chief joins a 17-member board which comprise 12 full members, ICC chair (Greg Barclay) and the independent director (Indra Nooyi)
articles.content:
Khimji came second in the election, where he polled 24 votes in an electoral college of 45 members. © Getty
Pankaj Khimji of Oman Cricket (OC) has sprung a major surprise in the Associates election … [+2808 chars]

articles.title: Sunil Chhetri applauds Premier League and FSDL for Next Generation Cup: An opportunity I didn't have - India Today
articles.description: India captain Sunil Chhetri applauded the joint effort of the Premier League and the Football Sports Development Limited to provide a great platform for young talent in the country in the form of the Next Generation Cup.
